roleset.name: (cause to) be defective

example.name: passive
example.text: But Kenneth Leon , a telecommunications analyst with Bear , Stearns& Co. , finds [the BellSouth proposal]-4 still flawed [*-4] because the company does n't have [*-1] to wait five years [*-2] to begin [*-3] buying more LIN shares .
example.arg: because the company does n't have [*-1] to wait five years [*-2] to begin [*-3] buying more LIN shares

example.name: Adjectival rel: flawed
example.text: I kinda expected more Jedis to be out there , although in all honesty , I would say that I have n't actually seen anyone wielding a lightsaber , so that may be flawed .

example.name: Arg1 only
example.text: That's its power and its flaw.

roleset.note: FLAW-V NOTES: Frames file for 'flaw' based on WSJ, BOLT-4,5. (from flaw.01-v)
